title: Learning Networks of Stochastic Differential Equations
abstract: We consider linear models for stochastic dynamics. To any such model can be associated a network (namely a directed graph) describing which degrees of freedom interact under the dynamics. We tackle the problem of learning such a network from observation of the system trajectory over a time interval $T$.
histories: This publication is to appear in NIPS 2010
COMMENTS: This publication is to appear in NIPS 2010
